author: jonl
msg: Fixed File[] and Folder[] return values to return zero length array instead of null.  This is much more convenient and I wish more methods that returned arrays did this.

author: ivaynberg
msg: refactored form validators to work closer to how component validators work

author: ivaynberg
msg: realign getinput close to how request parameters work. even if there is a single parameter httpservletrequest will still return an array with element length of 1, so getinput() shold use getinputasarray() and return the first element, this will give users a single point to override the mechanism instead of overriding getinput() and getinputasarrray()
